title: The Lone Ranger in Phoenix Later This Month
post:
Dan…who would be Tonto:
“Tonto is the Native-American partner of the Lone Ranger. He is from the Potawatomi tribe. His name means “Crazy One” or “The Fool”. “
author: rick

title: The Lone Ranger in Phoenix Later This Month
post: Tonto is from the Spanish, “stupid”, or “simple”…..
